patthana9.5:1.1_0: Nahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:1.1_1: Nahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:1.1_2: Nahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca nanahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:2.1_0: Nanahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:2.1_1: Nanahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:2.1_2: Nanahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca nanahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana9.5:3.1_0: Nahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca nanahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:3.1_1: Nahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca nanahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:3.1_2: Nahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca nanahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana9.5:3.1_3: ca nanahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:5.1_0: Nahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:5.1_1: Nahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:5.1_2: Nahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho ca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:6.1_0: Nanahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:6.1_1: Nanahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:6.1_2: Nanahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho ca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:7.1_0: Nahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighañca nanahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:7.1_1: Nahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighañca nanahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:7.1_2: Nahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighañca nanahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana9.5:7.1_3: ca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana9.5:8.1_0: Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava. (Sahajātavārepi …pe… sampayuttavārepi sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana9.5:9.1_0: Nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nanahetussa naanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana9.5:9.1_1: Nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nahetussa naanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana9.5:9.1_2: Nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nahetussa naanidassanasappaṭighassa ca nanahetussa naanidassanasappaṭighassa
patthana9.5:10.1_0: Nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nahetussa naanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana9.5:12.1_0: Nahetuṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
